title: Frente al Silencio
Tristesse
synopsis: Juan Bravo, a sus 60 años, hace una reflexión sobre lo que ha sido su vida, sus desengaños y sus escasos logros. Se siente un intelectual apartado por la sociedad y trata de vivir en su mundo artificial, a la vez que recuerda los momentos que marcaron realmente su existencia.

Fuensanta "La Moneta" es bailaora de flamenco. En su estudio de danza prepara un nuevo espectáculo basado en el libro "La Cabellera de la Shoá" del poeta Félix Grande. Decide visitar Auschwitz y enfrentarse al silencio.
synopsisEn: Fuensanta "La Moneta" is a contemporary flamenco dancer and choreographer. In her dance studio she prepares a new show with her students, however, everything changes when one of her students, Israeli and Jewish, gives her the book "La Cabellera de la Shoá" that Félix Grande wrote during his visit to Auschwitz and that marked his work to the point of being his last book. Fuensanta devours each poem by Félix Grande and doesn't stop thinking about those tons of accumulated hair, about the captive gypsies and the Jewish women marching towards certain death. It is then that she turns her show around and her goal is to visit Auschwitz to imbue herself with silence and look at it head-on. After convincing her manager, Raúl, she starts a retrospective in her show to mix dance, literature, music and the silent interpretation of millions of silent lives. Choosing three students in the cast will not be a comfortable task and each one will discover that "La Cabellera de Shoá" is a greater bond than they imagined.

2020, City of Oviedo (Oviedo, Principality of Asturias; north to Spain). Juan Bravo is a filmmaker in his 60. After a carrier full of ups and downs specially after the flop of his last movie (a controversial and violent version of Jesuchrist), he lives in semi-retirement in the capital of Asturias trying to find a reason to keep alive, spending his days lost in his remembers of childhood and his dreams of youth. During a party made by his close friend producer Jacinto to celebrate the success of his last project, this one offers Juan a new chance to come back for directing a further movie for him despite the financial troubles and the production. The offer makes Juan question himself if accept it despite his enemies or retiring definitely. Through his experiences and his memories the capacity of humanity for hatred, Juan Bravo travels the city of Oviedo in search of himself and the same time that he analyzes his own life and the importance to be alive, looking for inspiration. Accompanied by Chopin's piece "Tristesse" throughout the film, Juan learns about the need of the artist to create and the inevitable fall on disgrace of the maturity, addressing about about disloyalty, hatred or decadence living in addition bizarre and surrealist situations on his daily life while he has a flirtation with death embodied in the character of a writer. A movie with a city than protagonist as the own Juan Bravo
